# Schneider Electric (Modicon) EtherNet/IP Implementation

## Overview

Schneider Electric produces Modicon controllers and I/O modules that support EtherNet/IP.

## Vendor Information

- **Vendor ID:** 0x0002 (Schneider Electric)
- **Common Products:** Modicon M580, M340, Quantum, Premium
- **Documentation:** Schneider Electric Modicon EtherNet/IP documentation
